p: Moreover, the highest and lowest percentages of urinary excretion, diuretic action, and diuretic index were observed at 400 mg/kg and 100 mg/kg doses of the HME, respectively ( Figure 2). However, at 24th hr, the highest percentage of urinary excretion, diuretic action, and diuretic index at a dose of 200 mg/kg of the HME with values of 215%, 2.04, and 1.13, respectively, was observed.
